verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's alive, He's alive, He's alive forevermore,
Jesus is risen from the dead.
He's alive, He's alive, He's alive forevermore,
now He's become my Living Head.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Death no longer hath dominion,
satan's power is broken down.
He has triumphed, Hallelujah!
And He wears the victor's crown.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He's alive, He's alive, He's alive forevermore,
Jesus is risen from the dead.
